Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Relais Maresca in Capri, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Marina Grande, and close to Piazzetta Capri. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Bagni of Tiberio Beach and Museum Ignazio Cerio.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Relais Maresca. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Relais Maresca. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marina Grande - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Piazzetta Capri - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Bagni of Tiberio Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Museum Ignazio Cerio - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Gardens of Augustus - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Charterhouse of St. Giacomo - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Via Krupp - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Torre Saracena - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Villa San Michele - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Marina Piccola - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Monte Solaro Chairlift - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Piazza Vittoria - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Arco Naturale - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Casa Rossa - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Chiesa di San Michele - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Relais Maresca is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 36 km / 22.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Relais Maresca is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 36 km / 22.4 mi.
